extendedInfo.description: If you are Carly Rae Jepsen's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Carly Rae Jepsen's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Carly Rae Jepsen's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Carly Rae Jepsen's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :) -------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics -------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Tug Of War - Curiosity (EP) - Kiss -------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Almost Said It - Beautiful - Both Sides Now - Bucket - Call Me Maybe - Cup Of Tea - Curiosity - Drive - Good Time - Guitar String / Wedding Ring - Heart Is A Muscle - Heavy Lifting - Hotel Shampoos - Hurt So Good - I Know You Have A Girlfriend - Just A Step Away - Melt With You - Money And The Ego - More Than A Memory - Picture - Sour Candy - Sunshine On My Shoulders - Sweet Talker - Sweetie - Talk To Me - Tell Me - This Kiss - Tiny Little Bows - Tonight I'm Getting Over You - Tug Of War - Turn Me Up - Worldly Matters - Wrong Feels So Right
